amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the operating budget of the Office of the Defense Secretary by $216,556,400 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce spending in Operation and Maintenance and deposit the savings in the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 328 (Roll no. 496).
